title: Stensil serif typeface
content:
Hi. I need help again.  
I'm looking for a font similar to this:

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418090217/http:/typophile.com/files/1_26.jpg) | 33.69 KB |
author: marcinpetrus

comments.content:
Hi Marcin,

what about [Pochoir](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418090217/http:/www.yanone.de/typedesign/pochoir/)?

(Btw, you’re posting in the wrong forum, imho. Next time, please use the [Type ID board](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418090217/http:/typophile.com/forum/29))  
F

Pochoir looks very good. Thats what I was looking for. Thanks a lot!

.. and yes, it should be on the Type ID forum, sorry for that.  
Is there any way to move it?

You’re welcome.  
A lot more nice stencil faces [in this thread](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418090217/http:/typophile.com/node/20463).
